properties.description: This is the S51 advice curated table for ODT consumption

source: #### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

# from notebookutils import mssparkutils
# storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

# is_dev_or_test_env = 'dev' in storage_account or 'test' in storage_account
# max_limit = 20 if is_dev_or_test_env else 100000000

# spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

%%sql

---TEST TEST TEST----

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT

AD.NSIPAdviceID										AS [adviceId],
AD.AdviceReference									AS [adviceReference],
AD.CaseReference									AS [caseReference],
AD.Section51Advice									AS [title],
AD.EnquirerFirstName & ' ' & AD.EnquirerLastName	AS [from]


FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim 	AS AD
	
-- LIMIT ${MAX_LIMIT}

%%sql

---TEST TEST TEST----

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_s51_advice

USING delta

AS

SELECT 								
    						
*
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice
